description:
One of the "nests" in the town of http://anidb.net/ch26018 [Guri] where Haibane are living, the Abandoned Factory (located on the opposite side of town from http://anidb.net/ch26011 [Old Home]) is known for its inhabitants being a bit rough and unrefined.
As this isn`t the proper place for children, the younger Haibane from here are taken care of at Old Home and only visit the factory a few times a year.
name: Haikoujou
